dbQuery.query: SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='PODS_DATA' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1'))

SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='PODS_DATA' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1'))

SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='PODS_DATA' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1'

SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='PODS_DATA' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1'

select count(*) from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_USER' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1'
union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_ADMIN' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_USER' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.POI_TRACK t WHERE t.track_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_ADMIN' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_USER' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.POI_TRACK t WHERE t.track_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_ADMIN' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1' union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC t WHERE t.doc_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_POINT_USER' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1' union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_POINT_ADMIN' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_POINT_USER' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.POI_POINT t WHERE t.point_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_POINT_ADMIN' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_POINT_USER' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.POI_POINT t WHERE t.point_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_POINT_ADMIN' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_USER' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1' union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_ADMIN' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1') d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_USER' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.POI_TRACK t WHERE t.track_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_ADMIN' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED::integer = 1) d

select count(*) c from ( SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_USER' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.POI_TRACK t WHERE t.track_id = {ID} AND (t.status_id = 1 OR (t.cuser_id = {USER_ID} AND t.status_id = 0 ))) union all SELECT 1 dd FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_POI_TRACK_ADMIN' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1') d

SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='SUTSTPA' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}' AND pr.INSERT_PERMITTED = '1'))

SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='SUTSTPA' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}' AND pr.UPDATE_PERMITTED = '1'))

SELECT COUNT(*) c FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = {USER_ID} AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='SUTSTPA' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID='{CLASS_ID}' AND pr.DELETE_PERMITTED = '1'))
